root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 8-10-2, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability:

There are 161 countries with regional and World aggregates that have at least 1 data point after 2010 for this indicator:

Time series:

2011,2014, 2017 and 2021.

Disaggregation:

Disaggregation by Income, labour force; Age; Education level; Urban/rural; Gender
